author: emansipater
content: Hey all, I dropped a proposal on ethresear.ch for a "Dirt Simple Withdrawal Contract" designed to be deployable as fast as possible with essentially no development/design effort: https://ethresear.ch/t/dirt-simple-withdrawal-contract/8218

author: emansipater
content: I think sooner is better to give people the ability to start working on contracts which accept withdrawals, in particular so that we can have trustless staking pools as soon as possible.
